Privacy Policies

Last updated: September 16, 2024

1. Introduction

Anchor ("we," "us," or "our") is dedicated to safeguarding your privacy. This Privacy Policy outlines how we gather, utilize, share, and secure personal information through our mobile application ("App"), website, and associated services.

2. Scope

This Privacy Policy is applicable to:

  • The Anchor mobile application
  • The Anchor website
  • Any other services or features offered by Anchor

3. Information Collection

We gather information in several ways:

Location Data

We may gather location information to offer location-based features (with your consent).

Analytics Data
